entry.title: EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic : revision 3
entry.summary: Moved from draft to community approved status

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 8
entry.summary: Updated references to texSubImage2D. Added DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT to framebufferTexture2D.

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 7
entry.summary: Incorporated depth/stencil support and UNSIGNED_INT_24_8_WEBGL enum after discussion on public_webgl mailing list, including supported behavior and additional error behavior. Extended rules in Section 6.5 ("Framebuffer Object Attachments") to handle texture attachments.

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 6
entry.summary: Renamed to WEBGL prefix, and changed to reference ANGLE_depth_texture, because of limitations preventing the current ANGLE library from loading of image data to depth textures. Incorporated errors from ANGLE_depth_texure extension specification.

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 5
entry.summary: Renamed with OES prefix and removed the addendum due to expected harmonization between OES_depth_texture and ARB_depth_texture (depth cube maps).

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 4
entry.summary: Removed the enumerants from the IDL which are contained in the context and added aliases to the extension name

entry.title: OES_element_index_uint : revision 3
entry.summary: Removed the enumerants from the IDL which are contained in the context and added aliases to the extension name

entry.title: EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic : revision 2
entry.summary: Added the EXT suffix to the enumerants and aliases to the extension name

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 3
entry.summary: Changed referenced WebGL API version from 2.0 to 1.0

entry.title: OES_element_index_uint : revision 2
entry.summary: Removed the bufferData requirement as this is not checked by webgl
